name: Tony's Mansion
description:
Tony is a little blue ghost armed with a magical lantern. Tony must fight off hordes of evil spirits in order to ascend to a more peaceful plane of existence. His lantern grants him the ability to use a wide range battle techniques, which are gradually unlocked on his quest for more power. He will meet strange characters, discover secrets, and make friends along the way. 

There are 7 main bosses, a few secret ones, and countless enemy ghosts with different strengths and weaknesses. Explore the spooky Mansion and uncover its secrets. 

Tony's Mansion was my first game, originally made in 2014 using the original Game Maker. This 2021 version is greatly improved, with better graphics, music, sound effects, and countless bug fixes. Enjoy.
